text: avaravite vacc innane alamurayitum: "nannalute natha, nannaleyeann purattayakkename. nannal mump ceytirunnatil ninn vyatyastamayi nalla karyannal ceytukeallam." allahu parayum: "pathamulkkeallunnavarkk atulkkeallan matram nam ayus's nalkiyirunnille? ninnaluteyatutt munnariyippukaran vannittumuntayirunnille? atinalini anubhaviccukealluka. akramikalkkivite sahayiyayi arumilla
